front.title: Management Information Base for Load Balancers

abstract.t: Load balancer is deployed widely in datacenter nowadays. There is a requirement to build a unique LB network management system where two or more vendors' LB devices are used. We propose the standard MIBs for unique NMS. Load balancer description is introduced at "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Load_balancing_(computing)". This memo defines an portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes a MIB module for load balance device.
